name: Monster In The Dark: Remaster
description:
Monster In The Dark is designed to provide a single-player horror experience. You must have time to escape from the monster, using your inner feelings, running away from the monster, intuitively eating to find a way out, you must become a player who must cope with this situation, using the three-dimensional field using in yourself to develop intuition and thinking and orientation. You must develop the skill determine the sides of the horizon, determining your location relative to the sides of the horizon. What's more, you don't have to run away only... Also, you can hunt him. It's the heartbeat from hitting a monster after a step.
Escape or hunt!
As a Survivor, you have 5 options
1. Lure the monster so that he loses his landmark.
2. Or find a way out of the forest.
3. Shoot the monster
4.Collect 5 mystic balls
5. Find the gate of the monster
Single player game
You should give it a try if you think you can beat the Monster on your own!
Nightmare Mode
Look for houses, try to hide in order to deceive the Monster chasing you!
You will use a flashlight to see the silhouette of the object approaching you!
